reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Dr. Smith explains complex concepts very well, but sometimes the pace is a bit fast.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Dr. Brown is an excellent professor. Her lectures are clear, and she is always willing to help students.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Dr. Thompson is knowledgeable, but his teaching style is a bit disorganized. Office hours are helpful.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Lee is very strict and her exams are extremely difficult. The material is hard to understand.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson's passion for history makes his classes engaging and enjoyable. Highly recommended!

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Dr. White is very knowledgeable, but her grading can be tough. Participation in class discussions is crucial.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Dr. Davis is an average professor. The lectures can be a bit dry, but the content is solid.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Miller is very approachable and makes the subject interesting. Labs are well-organized.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Dr. Wilson encourages critical thinking and his lectures are thought-provoking. A great professor.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Moore's lectures are a bit monotonous and it's difficult to stay engaged. The material is challenging.
